title: Vel'Koz officially a Watcher?
body:
I'm gonna safely assume that our one-eyed hentai-kitten, Vel'Koz, is a Watcher, or maybe a younger iteration of the ancient Watchers trapped in the Freljord. 

P.S: That Ryze cinematic is officially one of the best things you guys have produced since 'A New Dawn'. Props to you Riot, you never fail to impress.

replies.body: Vel koz is not a watcher. The watchers are way different

Could he be a Void-corrupted Watcher? The similarities in their designs are quite uncanny.
Also, Vel'Koz's physical appearance and intelligence set him apart from all the other voidborn creatures.
The Watchers are already creatures of the Void. They can't be corrupted by it.

Source?
Because last time I checked the Watchers were called "masters of the Void", which doesn't imply they came from it.

Do I really need a source for this?

I didn't say Watchers came from the Void. I said they're creatures of it - associated with it, affiliated with it, however you want to put it. Wouldn't it be strange if the "masters of the Void" were also susceptible to it?

Quoting myself from my other reply:

>Not really. The Watchers could have discovered the Void (which we know has existed since the birth of the Universe) and weaponized it, kinda like how real world humans engineered vira and other biochemical weapons. We have almost complete mastery over those little critters in our laboratories, but we can still get infected by them.

Ahh, I see, thanks for the heads up!

Vel'Koz is not a Watcher, but something to note:

The Watcher in the Ryze cinematic seems to be draining his knowledge about the World Runes. Now, this is kind of wild mass guessing, but it's not improbable that the Watcher was doing that (or sucking out Ryze's power). Vel'Koz kills things for knowledge, right?

I think Vel'Koz is sort of a scout Voidspawn that acts like a mini-Watcher: find knowledge of Runeterra, and take it back to HQ (the Watchers) so they can prepare for invasion.

Currently he's stated as the (Supposed) first Voidborn to ever set foot on Runeterra, but I could definetly see him retconned in to a Watcher. Potentially that or a Voidborn made in their image to serve a much grander purpose than the majority of his kind. Difficult to say what Riot'll do with him there's definetly open options.
So was this a watcher that fought Ryze for the World Rune or was that Vel Koz?
Also riot didn;t mention vel'koz as a champion that Ryze interacted with. They only said Sona Nasus Mf and Trundle.
